Nick is 10 years of age, and he can be seen heading to the school principal’s office. He was rather confused as he didn’t do anything wrong, except he was told by his teacher, that the principal has got some surprise for the youngster. Of course he had no idea why he has been called in, but he took deep breath and headed over there straight away.

The office was just a couple of rooms from his classroom, so it was a short walk over when he reached towards the office door, and goes straight in. There, he saw the female receptionist at her own desk, to which Nick had to go over and inform her of his appearance.

“Hi umm... I’m here to see principal Shaw. I was told he’s got a surprise for me, so I’ve been asked to come over to see him.” Nick says to let the receptionist know.

The receptionist nodded in response and gives the principal a call on the phone. Nick waits nervously, since it was the first time he’s ever come to the office like this. He was left feeling a bit shaken as this point, but he remained calm as the receptionist hangs up the phone and informs Nick at this point of time.

“Principal Shaw would like to see you now!” The female receptionist says in the most calmest way possible.

“Thank you!” Nick responded with acknowledgement, and goes into the principal’s office for the first time.

Once he’s inside the room, it was a rather big office that had the look of a glamour texture to it, with principal Shaw being the head of the entire school. And speaking of which, that’s when Nick was greeted in by the school principal, who looks to be in his mid 40s, and has got some smile on his face. This was something Nick had never thought of anything, but he remained calm as he was about to receive his welcome, when closing the door behind him.

“Ah, Nick! It’s nice to see you here!” Principal Shaw greeted with a warm smile.

“It’s certainly nice to meet you too! Is there something you want to see me, sir?” Nick asked with a smile, as he felt nervous from the inside, when asked about his reasons being sent to the office in the first place.

“Well I’m glad you asked that question!” Principal Shaw responded with a cheerful tone. “Now as you know, you’ve been the best student of the whole school by a mile. So much so, that I wanna give you a role as a school hallway patrol, which you’ll start immediately! So when you see trouble, just take action and do whatever you want to stop this from happening again.”

Nick’s eyes were widened when he heard about this role he never expects to get one. He may see some hallway patrols when he was a so young, he could only ever dreamed of being one of them when old enough to do it. Thankfully his behaviour have made Principal Shaw the easiest decision he’s ever made, and now he gets to be like one when receiving a sash to know he’s on duty.

“Wow! Thanks, Principal Shaw! I never thought I could be in this position when I was a kindergarten.” Nick smiled heavily and puts it on to make himself feeling pride by any means.

“You’re welcome, Nick! But before you go, there’s just one thing I need you to try this. It’s a surprise I wanna see if that works on you?” Principal Shaw wondered and shows Nick of what kind?
